item.title: Delete plz
item.dc:creator: @dbs0310836 dbs0310836
item.description:
@dbs0310836 wrote:

In Client.java find :

Code:
playerXP = loadgame.playerXP;
After Add

Code:
pGender = loadgame.pGender;
pHead = loadgame.pHead;
pTorso = loadgame.pTorso;
pArms = loadgame.pArms;
pHands = loadgame.pHands;
pLegs = loadgame.pLegs;
pFeet = loadgame.pFeet;
pBeard = loadgame.pBeard;
pHairC = loadgame.pHairC;
pTorsoC = loadgame.pTorsoC;
pLegsC = loadgame.pLegsC;
pFeetC = loadgame.pFeetC;
pSkinC = loadgame.pSkinC;
apset = loadgame.apset;By Other Cases in Client.java :

Code:
case 101: //Character Design Screen
int gender = inStream.readSignedByte();
int head = inStream.readSignedByte();
int jaw = inStream.readSignedByte();
int torso = inStream.readSignedByte();
int arms = inStream.readSignedByte();
int hands = inStream.readSignedByte();
int legs = inStream.readSignedByte();
int feet = inStream.readSignedByte();
int hairC = inStream.readSignedByte();
int torsoC = inStream.readSignedByte();
int legsC = inStream.readSignedByte();
int feetC = inStream.readSignedByte();
int skinC = inStream.readSignedByte();

pGender = gender;
pHead = head;
pBeard = jaw;
pTorso = torso;
pArms = arms;
pHands = hands;
pLegs = legs;
pFeet = feet;
pHairC = hairC;
pTorsoC = torsoC;
pLegsC = legsC;
pFeetC = feetC;
pSkinC = skinC;
apset = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
break;Find the one in initilize void:

Code:
openWelcomeScreenCommentAfter Add:

Code:
if(!apset) { showInterface(3559); }
Find :

Code:
case 33216:
Before Add :

Code:
case 14067:
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
updateRequired = true;
closeInterface();
break;Anywhere in client.java add:

Code:
public void closeInterface() {
outStream.createFrame(219);
}Save and close client.java

Open Player.java
Find :

Code:
public int pHead;Before Add:

Code:
public int pGender;
public int pHairC;
public int pTorsoC;
public int pLegsC;
public int pFeetC;
public int pSkinC;
public boolean apset;Find :

Code:
player sexReplace the code before with:

Code:
playerProps.writeByte(pGender);Find :

Code:
// array of 5 bytes defining the colorsReplace the 5 lines after that (the lines that actually define colors) with :

Code:
playerProps.writeByte(pHairC); // hair color
playerProps.writeByte(pTorsoC); // torso color.
playerProps.writeByte(pLegsC); // leg color
playerProps.writeByte(pFeetC); // feet color
playerProps.writeByte(pSkinC); // skin color (0-6)Save and close Player.java
Open PlayerSave.java
Find:

Code:
public int[] playerXP; After Add:

Code:
public int pGender;
public int pHead;
public int pTorso;
public int pArms;
public int pHands;
public int pLegs;
public int pFeet;
public int pBeard;
public int pHairC;
public int pTorsoC;
public int pLegsC;
public int pFeetC;
public int pSkinC;
public boolean apset;Find :

Code:
playerXP = plr.playerXP; After Add:

Code:
pGender = plr.pGender;
pHead = plr.pHead;
pTorso = plr.pTorso;
pArms = plr.pArms;
pHands = plr.pHands;
pLegs = plr.pLegs;
pFeet = plr.pFeet;
pBeard = plr.pBeard;
pHairC = plr.pHairC;
pTorsoC = plr.pTorsoC;
pLegsC = plr.pLegsC;
pFeetC = plr.pFeetC;
pSkinC = plr.pSkinC;
apset = plr.apset;

NOT BY ME, BTW ITS KINDA HARD FOR JAVA-NEWBIES :eek:

but worked for me

and certian items when i put them into my bank nd then withdraw at a certian amount it crashes my server…

so if anybody knows the solutions can you please help? id greatly appreciate it![br][size=1]Posted at: September 20, 2006, 02:33:06 PM[/size][hr]any1? :([/quote]ok for #1 in the newer sources this is fixed
and for #2 you prob withdraw to much of that item
